item.title: Swagger: Super Bowls, Brass Balls, and FootballsA Memoir
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) From FOX NFL Sunday analyst and legendary Hall of Fame head football coach Jimmy Johnsonthe first to win both a college football championship and a Super Bowlthe long-awaited, intimate, no-regrets memoir recounting his extraordinary life and insightful lessons on winning, at every level. Hall of Fame football coach Jimmy Johnsons ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $14.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:11:41 UTC – Details)


From FOX NFL Sunday analyst and legendary Hall of Fame head football coach Jimmy Johnsonthe first to win both a college football championship and a Super Bowlthe long-awaited, intimate, no-regrets memoir recounting his extraordinary life and insightful lessons on winning, at every level.

Hall of Fame football coach Jimmy Johnsons house isnt on the way to anything. Yet, his private sanctuary on the Florida Keys Islamorada islands is a popular destination to which college and professional coaches, general managers, and team owners regularly trek to seek advicehow to build a positive team culture, draft elite players, balance work and family life, and lead a team to win. Why? Because Jimmy Johnson has done it allrising through the college coaching ranks to lead the University of Miami Hurricanes to a national championship, winning two consecutive Super Bowls with the Dallas Cowboys, and handling public triumphs while dealing with private adversity. Now, in Swagger, written with veteran sports journalist Dave Hyde, Johnson shares a candid account of his life experiences that have turned him into a legend in the coaching world.

From his early days on the college football fields at Louisiana Tech to his arrival as the Cowboys coach in 1989, Swagger traces the history of Johnsons career, and his lifelong mission to win. His larger-than-life personality and hard-driving, tough-talking coaching style led him to become one of only six coaches in NFL history to win back-to-back Super Bowls. Swagger shows the behind-the-scenes details of his professional conflict with Cowboys owner Jerry Jones and his personal revelations following his mothers death and his sons struggle with addiction. It reveals Johnsons formula for winning, including his criteria for identifying talent, his core beliefs, how he replaced legendary coaches like Tom Landry and Don Shula, coached stars from a young Troy Aikman to an aging Dan Marino, and established the ever-elusive sense of culture that every team leader hopes to achieve. More than a highlight reel, Swagger reveals the hard-won lessons Jimmy Johnson has learned both as a man and as a coach through a lifetime dedicated to excellence.

From the Publisher

Publisher : Scribner (November 15, 2022)
Language : English
Hardcover : 288 pages
ISBN-10 : 1668008629
ISBN-13 : 978-1668008621
Item Weight : 1.04 pounds
Dimensions : 6 x 1.2 x 9 inches

Product Description

THE MORE FUN

THE BETTER

Cool Game Sets for Outdoor Activities While enjoying the fresh air, playing the ball catch game in backyard, park or on the lawn will be a very pleasant experience. Top Gift Idea: It will be a perfect idea to give away the toss and catch ball game set as a gift for Easter and birthday.More Interaction: To play the sport games at least 2 persons are required. So it will be a good chance for socialization and interaction among friends.Family Pack: 4 Pop-launcher Baskets and 6 balls, your whole family members can join the family games. You will enjoy the toss and catch ball game and love sports more than ever.

Mission and Vision of Duckura

Duckura are committed to the production and sales of toys for many years, and have been adhering to the provision of better quality, more creative, educational toys, and better service. Make kids learning in playing. Encourage parent and kids play outdoor and become friends.

Great sports and super fun!

Do you love sports and anything that involves throwing and grabbing a ball? Are your kids crazy about ball catching games?

If the answer to those questions is yes, then you should try these sport toys. We have designed the ball catching game that will offer you endless hours of ball throwing and catching.

PACKING LIST

Pop-launcher Baskets x 4 (2 Blue & 2 Green) Balls x 6 (3 Green + 3 Red) Colorful Storage Box x 1

High Premium and Safe Material

The launcher baskets and balls are made from high-quality ABS plastic. You will never worry about your kids getting hurt.

Educational Sports for Kids

This catch ball set will help your kids develop fine motor skills, hand-eye coordination, problem-solving, spatial and communication skills!

Activities for Indoor & Outdoor

Our catch ball games can be played both indoor and outdoor.Very easy to take apart and assemble, convenient for taking to vacations, picnics, tailgating, camping, birthday parties and more!

Carnival Toss Games

Great Toy Set for Kids

TOSS N’ CATCH GAMESAre you boring during the holidays with family? This toss and catch ball sets are suit for you. Whatever backyard, lawn, camping, beach, pool or indoor, you can play with them anywhere you want.
EASY To PLAYHold the ball holder basket in your hands, press the trigger to launch the ball and another one use basket to catch it. Let’s start the throwing and catching ball races with friends.
ADULTS & KIDS ACTIVEThese sports games are good ideal for both kids and adults, whatever different skill levels. Suitable to indoor or outdoor activities with family.
DEVELOP FINE MOTOR SKILLSBesides being fun, this sport toys can help your kids collaborate and interact with other kids more easily. Help them develop fine motor skills and increase social skills.
PACKAGE INCLUDEPackage will Comes with 4 launchers(2-blue and 2-green), 6 ping-pong balls(2 color random) and Exquisite Color box.(Great for Gifts).

THE MORE FUN

THE BETTER

Read more

  • Cool Game Sets for Outdoor Activities While enjoying the fresh air, playing the ball catch game in backyard, park or on the lawn will be a very pleasant experience.
  • Top Gift Idea: It will be a perfect idea to give away the toss and catch ball game set as a gift for Easter and birthday.
  • More Interaction: To play the sport games at least 2 persons are required. So it will be a good chance for socialization and interaction among friends.
  • Family Pack: 4 Pop-launcher Baskets and 6 balls, your whole family members can join the family games. You will enjoy the toss and catch ball game and love sports more than ever.

Product Description

When 2 people are doing target practice together, it’s easy enough to add up points at the end by checking the pockets, since each person has a different color of ball.

360Rotation Power Popper Guns

Comes with two air powered guns, easy to use and fun. Gun collects air when pushing handle out and uses it to push the ball out when pulling handle in.

Blast Shooting Target Toy

The pump action gun is easy enough for the children to operate. The blast shooting game can play indoor and outdoor, and kids can play with friends and family.

Shooting Range 12 to 15 ft Max

Balls are also soft and light. The balls are not hard, so don’t hurt even if hit in close range. This is nice indoor game for kids.

Perfect Birthday Gift Choice

The shooting game toy is very light-weight, and more over not harmful for small kids. It comes with everything you need for a fun, kid-based shooting range. Party favor gift for any child who’s like fighting game!

Shooting Target Games Kit: Package has a whole setup with shoot range board, 24pcs soft foam balls (2 colors: 12 orange and 12 yellow) and 2pcs Air pump blaster guns. This target practice toy is perfect because it comes with everything you need for a fun and big enough for 2 kids to shoot the targets at the same time.
2-Player Mode Fun Gun Toy: The target board is very light weight and easy to setup and easy to put away as well. The use and operation of the pump action gun is easy enough for the youngest to operate. The power popper gun has 360 degree butt and shoot around 12ft, so much fun shooting at the target and competing for who can get the most shots.
Great Indoor Game for Kids: The guns are easy to load by just pressing the balls by hand into the front where they are shot out of. The foam balls are very light and it is painless when you are hit, very safe for little kids. The balls being two different colors is very helpful so that players can easy enough to add up points and know who will win more scores.
Fun for Kids and Adults: The blast shooting game can play outside or a big basement, and kids can play with friends and family. This toy can shoot quite a distance but are not painful in any way. Perfect for target practice and games, improve hand-eye coordination and fine motor skills. A great well made toy for children of all ages.
Great Idea Gift for Age 5+: It’s a parent-child interactive toy that can reduce kid’s devices time and make fun family time! Highly recommend it if you’re looking for something simple and entertaining that promotes physical activity and can be used indoors or outdoors. The best choice for boys Birthday gift or Christmas gift.
